name: Stunning Assault

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Str 13, Power Attack, base attack bonus +16.

sections.body: You can choose to take a –5 penalty on all melee attack rolls and combat maneuver checks to stun targets you hit with your melee attacks for 1 round. A successful Fortitude save negates the effect. The DC of this save is 10 + your base attack bonus. You must choose to use this feat before making the attack roll, and its effects last until your next turn.
sections.name: Benefits

description: You powerful but imprecise attacks can stun your enemies.
